issue.title: [CI][Spark] Support specific Spark version in the integration tet including latest
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7127](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7127). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The current spark integration test only supports spark's master branch. I'd nice to have a way to test the latest and specific releases as well, similarly like the other integration tests [do](https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/ci/docker/conda-python-pandas.dockerfile#L25)

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7127?focusedCommentId=17150476) by Bryan Cutler (bryanc):*
Closing this for now, ARROW-7717 added a test against the latest Spark release. It might be nice to test against specific releases, but that would often require applying a patch.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7127?focusedCommentId=17585879) by @toddfarmer:*
Transitioning issue from Resolved to Closed to based on resolution field value.
